attributes.action: Restrict voting rights to British citizens who are long-term residents
attributes.additional_details: I believe people should have spent time living in the UK long-term before they are granted voting rights. I think that only people who have lived in the UK for a long time can fully understand the culture and politics.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to restrict voting rights to eligible British citizens who have resided in the UK for a minimum of ten years.
